title: How to make my own 100% artificial voice from scratch - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on what you mean. Even most text-to-speech software has voice actors. So, for starters, you need someone to record. Then you can use almost any audio editing software to create something that sounds artificial. As far as creating an artificial voice from scratch, with no voice actor, that’s a mountain of programming if it’s even possible.
